Leon M. Lion https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leon_M._Lion 0 Leon Marks Lion (12 March 1879 – 28 March 1947) was an English stage and film actor, playwright, theatrical director and producer. Leon_Marks_Lion ( 12_March_1879 – 28_March_1947 ) was an_English_stage_and_film_actor , playwright , theatrical_director_and_producer .
